'''Mythcon 19''' was the nineteenth annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference. 

*'''Theme:''' "Legends for a New Land: Fantasy in America"
*'''Guests of Honor:''' [[Ursula K. Le Guin]] (fantasy author) and Brian Attebery (fantasy scholar)
*'''Chairman:''' [[David Bratman]]
